name: Lonely Way (OctopusMastermind, Barera_Mafia, Cpt_Hvitt)
description:
They hard to see, but they can see you. A burden of guilt.

Cold and Darkness.

Control:

Mouse look;

Mouse left click - shoot;

A,D - Move;

Space - Inventory.

Drag bullet in your gun.

Development by

https://cpt-hvitt.itch.io/ - sound designer and gamedesigner

https://barera-mafia.itch.io/ - art UI and Details;

https://octopusmastermind.itch.io/ - art characters, location and etc. Small scripts;

https://capitan-salat.itch.io/ - development core gameplay, level designer and  compilation.

Good luck!
